boat.name: Oran na Mara
boat.full_description:
9Nick Henshall commisioned the hull build after recovering from a motorcycle accident and having to give up fishing. He fitted her out over 5 years. She was for sale in 2009-10 and sold to Neyland, South Wales. The current owner saw her there in in a neglected state in April 2019 and spent 3 months restoring her, before relaunching in July 2019.

 She will require some further input for solo sailing for which UK Rigging Penryn and a friend will advise
boat.construction_details: Moulded GRP hull, cabin, and forehatch plinth. Wooden deck beams, rudder, dog house
boat.short_description: Oran na Mara is a powerful little cutter of the Sea Scamp class
